Vega.jl

A Julia package for generating visualizations in Vega

Visualization Primitives
Creating A Visualization From Scratch

Visualization Modifying Functions

xlab! / ylab!
xlim! / ylim!
title!
legend! (Add Title)
showlegend! / hidelegend!
colorscheme!
coord_flip!

View the Project on GitHubjohnmyleswhite/Vega.jl

xlim! / ylim!

Required Arguments:

v::VegaVisualization
min::Real
max::Real

This function mutates :VegaVisualization, modifying the min/max of the axes.

Default Axis limits

using Vega

x = [1:100; 1:100]
y = [[1:100] + randn(100); 3.0 + 1.5 * [1:100] + randn(100)]
group = [[1 for i in 1:100]; [2 for i in 1:100]]

v = lineplot(x = x, y = y, group = group)

Modified Axis limits

xlim!(v, 0, 200)
ylim!(v, 0, 200)
